ComicInfo.Series: The Deadly Hands of Kung Fu
ComicInfo.Title: Demons in Painted Death; The Corpse Rider; Chapter I The Rites of Every Citizen
ComicInfo.Summary:
Shang-Chi has a spook-filled smackdown in "Demons in Painted Death"!
*Story A -- Master of Kung Fu: Demons in Painted Death!* In the lair of the Golden Dragon Shang-Chi finds that nothing is what is seems... that friend may suddenly be foe... and death is the only constant!
*Story B -- Sons of the Tiger: The Rites of Every Citizen!* The Tiger Sons use staffs and nunchakus against an entire prison... and even that may not be enough to save their lives!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 17:15:24. [Issue ID 29000]

ComicInfo.Inker: Stan Gan,Rudy Nebres,Sanho Kim,Frank McLaughlin,Rudy Nebres,Sanho Kim,Stan Gan,Frank McLaughlin
